deck.name: Goblin Gang
deck.description: Spawns five Goblins - three with knives, two with spears - at a discounted Elixir cost. It's like a Goblin Value Pack!

deck.name: Miner
deck.description: The Miner can burrow his way underground and appear anywhere in the Arena. It's not magic, it's a shovel.

deck.name: Zap
deck.description: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Minion Horde
deck.description: Six fast, unarmored flying attackers. Three's a crowd, six is a horde!

deck.name: Sparky
deck.description: Sparky slowly charges up, then unloads MASSIVE area damage. Overkill isn't in her vocabulary.

deck.name: Tornado
deck.description: Drags enemy troops to its center while dealing damage over time, just like a magnet. A big, swirling, Tornado-y magnet. Doesn't affect buildings.

deck.name: Electro Wizard
deck.description: He lands with a "POW!", stuns nearby enemies and shoots lightning with both hands! What a show off.

deck.name: Giant
deck.description: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. A real one-man wrecking crew!

deck.name: Mini P.E.K.K.A
deck.description: The Arena is a certified butterfly-free zone. No distractions for P.E.K.K.A, only destruction.

deck.name: Dark Prince
deck.description: The Dark Prince deals area damage and lets his spiked club do the talking for him - because when he does talk, it sounds like he has a bucket on his head.

deck.name: Wizard

deck.name: Arrows
